author: Special Correspondent
text:
PMK Chief Ministerial candidate Anbumani Ramadoss has said that on what basis did MDMK leader Vaiko come forward to support Vijayakant's candidature for the Chief Minister’s post.

“Mr. Vaiko had said it was against democracy to propose someone as a Chief Minister before the elections. Now what made him change his stand? He owes an explanation to the people of Tamil Nadu. When Mr. Vijayakant failed to function as the Leader of the Opposition how could perform the responsibilities of a Chief Minister.”
title: Anbumani questions Vaiko’s support to Vijayakant
